title: Australian Senate Report Recommends 'Comprehensive Review' of Loot Boxes...

embed.description: Report criticised by Australian Greens for arriving with just a 'single watered-down recommendation.' The Australian Senate Environment and Communications References Committee has delivered its final report examining loot boxes in video games. The 'Gaming micro-transactions for chance-based items' report culminates in a single recommendation: that the Australian Government "undertake a comprehensive review of loot boxes in video games."

replies.body:
What a load of shit. You buy 3 orbs for 750 RP (250 RP each) and get a skin. If ~60% of the skins are at least 975 RP or higher (it's closer to 70% if you include the 750 RP) you at least break even 60-70% of the time. You make a ~143% profit if you get a Legendary, ~50% profit if you get an Epic, ~320% profit if you get an Ultimate. Then you have Mythic skins that are invaluable (it usually takes about ~$100-worth of Orbs to get them through Gemstones).

In effect, you can get every skin in the game via the loot system at ~30% off.
